verses.verse: And the second <S%H8145><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, even for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>: and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.
And they had for their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> Beer-sheba <S%H884><s%>, or Sheba <S%H7652><s%>, and Moladah <S%H4137><s%>,
and Hazar-shual <S%H2705><s%>, and Balah <S%H1088><s%>, and Ezem <S%H6107><s%>,
and Eltolad <S%H513><s%>, and Bethul <S%H1329><s%>, and Hormah <S%H2767><s%>,
and Ziklag <S%H6860><s%>, and Beth-marcaboth <S%H1024><s%>, and Hazar-susah <S%H2701><s%>,
and Beth-lebaoth <S%H1034><s%>, and Sharuhen <S%H8287><s%>; thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Ain <S%H5871><s%>, Rimmon <S%H7417><s%>, and Ether <S%H6281><s%>, and Ashan <S%H6228><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:

and all the villages <S%H2691><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> to Baalath-beer <S%H1192><s%>, Ramah <S%H7414><s%> of the South <S%H5045><s%>. This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

Out of the part <S%H2256><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>; for the portion <S%H2506><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was too much <S%H7227><s%> for them <S%H1121><s%>: therefore the children of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> had inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5157><s%>.

And the third <S%H7992><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was unto Sarid <S%H8301><s%>;

and their border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, even to Maralah <S%H4831><s%>, and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Dabbesheth <S%H1708><s%>; and it reached <S%H6293><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Jokneam <S%H3362><s%>;

and it turned <S%H7725><s%> from Sarid <S%H8301><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%> unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Chisloth-tabor <S%H3696><s%>; and it went out <S%H3318><s%> to Daberath <S%H1705><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> to Japhia <S%H3309><s%>;

and from thence it passed along <S%H5674><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> to Gath-hepher <S%H1662><s%>, to Eth-kazin <S%H6278><s%>; and it went out <S%H3318><s%> at Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> which stretcheth unto Neah <S%H5269><s%>;

and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> about it on the north <S%H6828><s%> to Hannathon <S%H2615><s%>; and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out thereof were at the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Iphtah-el <S%H3317><s%>;

and Kattath <S%H7005><s%>, and Nahalal <S%H5096><s%>, and Shimron <S%H8110><s%>, and Idalah <S%H3030><s%>, and Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>: twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
The fourth <S%H7243><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, even for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
And their border <S%H1366><s%> was unto Jezreel <S%H3157><s%>, and Chesulloth <S%H3694><s%>, and Shunem <S%H7766><s%>,
and Hapharaim <S%H2663><s%>, and Shion <S%H7866><s%>, and Anaharath <S%H588><s%>,
and Rabbith <S%H7245><s%>, and Kishion <S%H7191><s%>, and Ebez <S%H77><s%>,
and Remeth <S%H7432><s%>, and Engannim <S%H5873><s%>, and En-haddah <S%H5876><s%>, and Beth-pazzez <S%H1048><s%>,

and the border <S%H1366><s%> reached <S%H6293><s%> to Tabor <S%H8396><s%>, and Shahazumah <S%H7831><s%>, and Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%>; and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out of their border <S%H1366><s%> were at the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: sixteen <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
And the fifth <S%H2549><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
And their border <S%H1366><s%> was Helkath <S%H2520><s%>, and Hali <S%H2482><s%>, and Beten <S%H991><s%>, and Achshaph <S%H407><s%>,
and Allammelech <S%H487><s%>, and Amad <S%H6008><s%>, and Mishal <S%H4861><s%>; and it reached <S%H6293><s%> to Carmel <S%H3760><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and to Shihor-libnath <S%H7884><s%>;

and it turned <S%H7725><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%> to Beth-dagon <S%H1016><s%>, and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, and to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Iphtah-el <S%H3317><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> to Beth-emek <S%H1025><s%> and Neiel <S%H5272><s%>; and it went out <S%H3318><s%> to Cabul <S%H3521><s%> on the left hand <S%H8040><s%>,
and Ebron <S%H5683><s%>, and Rehob <S%H7340><s%>, and Hammon <S%H2540><s%>, and Kanah <S%H7071><s%>, even unto great <S%H7227><s%> Sidon <S%H6721><s%>;

and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> to Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and to the fortified <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> to Hosah <S%H2621><s%>; and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out thereof were at the sea <S%H3220><s%> by the region <S%H2256><s%> of Achzib <S%H392><s%>;
Ummah <S%H5981><s%> also <S%H663><s%>, and Aphek, and Rehob <S%H7340><s%>: twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, even for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their border <S%H1366><s%> was from Heleph <S%H2501><s%>, from the oak <S%H438><s%> in Zaanannim <S%H6815><s%>, and Adami-nekeb <S%H129><s%>, <S%H5346><s%> and Jabneel <S%H2995><s%>, unto Lakkum <S%H3946><s%>; and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out thereof were at the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>;

and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to Aznoth-tabor <S%H243><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> from thence to Hukkok <S%H2712><s%>; and it reached <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%>, and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Asher <S%H836><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%>, and to Judah <S%H3063><s%> at the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%>.
And the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> were Ziddim <S%H6661><s%>, Zer <S%H6863><s%>, and Hammath <S%H2575><s%>, Rakkath <S%H7557><s%>, and Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%>,
and Adamah <S%H128><s%>, and Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and Hazor <S%H2674><s%>,
and Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>, and Edrei <S%H154><s%>, and En-hazor <S%H5877><s%>,

And Iron <S%H3375><s%>, and Migdal-el <S%H4027><s%>, Horem <S%H2765><s%>, and Beth-anath <S%H1043><s%>, and Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%>; nineteen <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
The seventh <S%H7637><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
And the border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was Zorah <S%H6881><s%>, and Eshtaol <S%H847><s%>, and Ir-shemesh <S%H5905><s%>,
and Shaalabbin <S%H8169><s%>, and Aijalon <S%H357><s%>, and Ithlah <S%H3494><s%>,
and Elon <S%H356><s%>, and Timnah <S%H8553><s%>, and Ekron <S%H6138><s%>,
and Eltekeh <S%H514><s%>, and Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%>, and Baalath <S%H1191><s%>,
and Jehud <S%H3055><s%>, and Bene-berak <S%H1139><s%>, and Gath-rimmon <S%H1667><s%>,
and Me-jarkon <S%H4313><s%>, and Rakkon <S%H7542><s%>, with the border <S%H1366><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Joppa <S%H3305><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> beyond them <S%H1121><s%>; for the children of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Leshem <S%H3959><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H5221><s%>, and smote it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and possessed <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3427><s%>, and dwelt therein <S%H7121><s%>, and called Leshem <S%H3959><s%>, Dan <S%H1835><s%>, after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

So they made an end <S%H3615><s%> of distributing the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by the borders <S%H1367><s%> thereof <S%H1121><s%>; and the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> in the midst of them <S%H8432><s%>:

according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> him the city <S%H5892><s%> which he asked <S%H7592><s%>, even Timnath-serah <S%H8556><s%> in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>; and he built <S%H1129><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and dwelt therein <S%H3427><s%>.

These are the inheritances <S%H5159><s%>, which Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, distributed for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>. So they made an end <S%H3615><s%> of dividing <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.
